properties.name: url
properties.label: URL
properties.description: Provide the URL to send the HTTP DELETE request. Include Message property values using {propertyname}, {{parametername}} for a flow parameter.

properties.name: request_timeout
properties.label: Request Timeout in Seconds
properties.description: How long to wait for request completion.

properties.name: headers
properties.label: Headers
properties.description: Provide the HTTP headers for the request.

properties.name: body
properties.label: Request Body
properties.description: Provide the request body to send. Include variables using {propertyname} for incoming a message's property value, {body} if the incoming message is a Text Message, or to use a flow parameter value, reference it with {{parametername}}.
